Articles.Content:
Will there be a native achievement system in KSP 2? I feel like its a no brainer idea, plus it really fits the whole military hierarchy thing that is closely related to space industry. There could be medals/ribbons, plaques, promotions, suits/helmets etc.. I think it could add a valuable intrinsic gameplay arch that could fuel 100s of hours. And this really should be NATIVE, not a mod. Good art and implementation is a must, I think. 

Anyone out there agree ?
This suggestion for KSP2 has been moved to the KSP2 Suggestions subforum.
